description: This dashboard can be used to detect issues on the Loki stack, when deployed in Kubernetes. Shows: some error metrics published by Promtail/Loki. Error and warning logs emitted by Promtail/Loki. Memory and CPU usage of Promtail/Loki compared against the Kubernetes memory/cpu limits and requests.

panels.title: Summary of alerts status
Problems in the Loki Stack

alert.name: Loki has emitted error/warning messages in the last 5m

panels.description: Total number of messages logged by Loki itself
panels.title: Number of error/warning messages logged by Loki itself
Error/warning messages logged by Loki itself

alert.name: Promtail has emitted error/warning messages in the last 5m

panels.description: Total number of messages logged by Promtail
panels.title: Error/warning messages logged by Promtail
Error/warning messages logged by Promtail

alert.name: Loki distributor has failed to send batches to ingesters

panels.title: Loki (distributor) - failed batch appends sent to ingesters

alert.name: Promtail has dropped logs in the last 5m

panels.description: Number of log entries dropped because failed to be sent to the Loki ingester after all retries.
panels.title: Promtail - dropped log entries
Logging activity

alert.name: The number of streams in Loki is above 5000

panels.description:
The total number of streams created per tenant.
This should not increase after startup.
panels.title: Number of Streams in Loki

panels.description: The total number of log entries received per tenant (not necessarily of lines, as an entry can have more than one line of text).
panels.title: Loki (distributor) - log entries received per second

alert.name: Quantity of data received by the Loki ingester is suspiciously high

panels.description: The total number of uncompressed bytes received per tenant.
panels.title: Bytes received in ingester per second
Memory usage

alert.name: Loki memory usage is above 80% of the defined limit

panels.description: Percentage of actual usage over configured limit
panels.title: Loki memory usage (% of Kubernetes memory limit)
Loki memory usage vs Kubernetes limit and request

alert.name: Promtail memory usage is above 80% of the defined limit

panels.description: Percentage of actual usage over configured limit
panels.title: Promtail memory usage (% of Kubernetes memory limit)
Promtail memory usage vs Kubernetes limit and request
CPU Usage

alert.name: Loki CPU usage is above 80% of the defined limit

panels.title: Loki CPU usage (% of Kubernetes CPU limit)
Loki CPU usage vs Kubernetes limit and request

alert.name: Promtail CPU usage is above 80% of the defined limit

panels.title: Promtail CPU usage (% of Kubernetes limit)
Promtail CPU usage vs Kubernetes limit and request

title: Loki stack monitoring (Promtail, Loki)
